```{r}
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
bigboston=rbind(Boston2019,Boston2020,Boston2022,Boston2021)
```
```{r}
bigbostona=separate(bigboston,open_dt,into = c("year","month","day"))
bigbostona$nmonth=as.numeric(bigbostona$month)
bigbostona$nyear=as.numeric(bigbostona$year)


```
```{r}
bigbostona$day=sub(" .*", "", bigbostona$day)
```

```{r}

bigbostona$season =ifelse(bigbostona$nmonth<=3,"winter",ifelse(bigbostona$nmonth>=6 & bigbostona$nmonth<=9,"summer",ifelse(bigbostona$nmonth>=3&bigbostona$nmonth<=6,"spring",ifelse(bigbostona$nmonth>=9&bigbostona$nmonth<=12,"fall",""))))
```
```{r}
bigbostona$open_dt=bigboston$open_dt%>%as.Date()

```
```{r}
bigbostona$casetime= (bigbostona$closed_dt%>%as.Date() - bigbostona$open_dt)
bigbostona$days=gsub("\\ .*", "",bigbostona$casetime)%>%as.numeric()
```
```{r}
seasontrend=aggregate(days~season,bigbostona,mean)
#good 
```
